QuestDescription.SourceString: Recruited with promises of glory, your first challenge is to defeat General Velgar.
QuestDescription.LocalizedString: Recruited with promises of glory, your first challenge is to defeat General Velgar.

Value.SourceString: Construct a base of operations in Bramblemead village. Build a shelter and claim a bed.
Value.LocalizedString: Construct a base of operations in Bramblemead village. Build a shelter and claim a bed.

ObjectiveTexts.Key: Return to the Wise old man after claimed bed

Value.SourceString: Speak to the Wise Old Man in Bramblemead village.
Value.LocalizedString: Speak to the Wise Old Man in Bramblemead village.

Value.SourceString: Hunt a deer and bring one of its antlers to the Wise Old Man.
Value.LocalizedString: Hunt a deer and bring one of its antlers to the Wise Old Man.

Value.SourceString: Siege the goblin castle and look for Cathan.
Value.LocalizedString: Siege the goblin castle and look for Cathan.

Value.SourceString: Investigate the blue-flame door in the swamp. Find out what Cathan is up to.
Value.LocalizedString: Investigate the blue-flame door in the swamp. Find out what Cathan is up to.

ObjectiveTexts.Key: Return to the Wise old man

Value.SourceString: Speak to the Wise Old Man in Bramblemead village.
Value.LocalizedString: Speak to the Wise Old Man in Bramblemead village.

Value.SourceString: Gear yourself up and push forward into Ghornfell in search of Cathan.
Value.LocalizedString: Gear yourself up and push forward into Ghornfell in search of Cathan.

ObjectiveTexts.Key: Look for evidence of Cathan at the tower

Value.SourceString: Investigate Velgar's tower in search of Cathan.
Value.LocalizedString: Investigate Velgar's tower in search of Cathan.

Value.SourceString: Find the ingredients and craft the Challenge Horn. Check the recipe in your journal for more information.
Value.LocalizedString: Find the ingredients and craft the Challenge Horn. Check the recipe in your journal for more information.

ObjectiveTexts.Key: Return to the Wise old man after killing velgar

Value.SourceString: Bring Velgar's head to the Wise Old Man outside Velgar's Lair.
Value.LocalizedString: Bring Velgar's head to the Wise Old Man outside Velgar's Lair.
